title: Asteroids Ahead
prompt: You are approaching an asteroid field...

options.text: I'm the best. Navigate the asteroid field yourself. <mini game>
Let Jesus take the wheel.
Trust my pilot to guide us to victory. <skip mini game>
Take the long way around

title: Rations Low
prompt: Rations are dwindling. What is your solution?

options.text: Try and divide them equally. <mini game>
I am the greatest and most important. I will eat all the rations myself.
Ask my nutritionist to divide it by crew members' needs. <skip mini game>
Let the crew fight it out.

title: Rations Missing
prompt: You discover that rations are missing. What now?

options.text: Investigate the crime seen.
Tell the group to deal with it.
Blame someone I don't like.

title: Mouse Found
prompt: A mouse was found eating rations. What will you do?

options.text: I played baseball. Try and throw things at it. <mini game>
Animals love me. Try and befriend the mouse.
Have the engineer make a mouse trap. <skip mini game>

title: Terminator Times
prompt: The ship AI says, I'm the captain now

options.text: Accept defeat. All hail our AI overlords.
Yell, I MADE YOU and give it a stern punch.
Have my programmer fix the malfunction.

title: Morale is Low
prompt: Crew members seem down in the dumps.

options.text: Tell them a story about how great you are.
Remind them that going to Mars is a big deal.
Tell your comedian to do stand-up.
Tell your musician to play a song.
